column1: Table 6-91:  Quantitative Uncertainty Estimates of N2O Emissions from Soils in Settlements Remaining Settlements (MMT CO2 Eq. and Percent)

column4: Uncertainty Range Relative to Emission Estimate a

column1: Note: These estimates include direct and indirect N2O emissions from Settlements Remaining Settlements and Land Converted to Settlements because it was not possible to separate the activity data.
a Range of emission estimates predicted by Monte Carlo Stochastic Simulation for a 95 percent confidence interval.
